attributes.action: Admit that he, Gordon Brown and Tony Blair, the former Prime Minister are both anti English and have given Scotland preferential treatment. GIVE THE ENGLISH EQUALITY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parliaments for everywhere except England. 

Trying to make England disappear. Promotes Scottishness but tries to hide English nationality with "Britishness". And this is just the tip of the ice-berg.

England subsidys to Scotland
All major governmental positions for last 11 years held by Scotsmen, not very democratic

Please sign if you wish our Prime Minister to publicly admit to this and you want to demand equality from this government.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
